transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji kaun?
Customer: Haan ji Kunal Choudhary baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Ji kaise hain?
Executive: Ji ji badhiya ji badhiya bataiye aap.
Executive: Badhiya badhiya aapka concern open hua tha aapne customer care ko bol diya hoga.
Customer: Ji ji sir wo hamari leads nahi aa rahi na hamari company yani ki hamare products mein uski leads nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Aapke jo product hai uski lead nahi aa rahi aap ye keh rahe ho.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Check kiya aapne usse portal pe?
Customer: Ji ji maine check kiya hai aa rahi hai but chhoti machine mein aa rahi hai usi mein hi hamari sari badi machine hai sir.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Jaise ki ye aa rahi hai wood chipper ki 500 kilo per hour aa rahi hai chhoti machine hai aur hum banate hain wood chipper bada jaise ek tan do tan mein ek aur aa gaya food shredder machine ki ye hai 100 kilo per hour mein lekin hum 100 kilo per hour banate hi nahi hai ye aa gayi hai grinder machine 15 inch wali hum banate hain 30 inch ki matlab hamare ko benefit nahi hai ye 15 15 inch ki ek HP wali motors ki ye bhi ek HP motor ye bhi ek HP motor ki ye teen HP ki motor ye ye 30 inch ki ye bhi 100 kilo per hour ki.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji ji aur suno.
Executive: Hmm. Main isme khol lu main fir dekh raha hu kaun si.
Executive: Main ek bari khol lu na isko.
Customer: Ji ji sir bilkul kholiye aap.
Executive: Ek second main khol raha hu zara main aapko bata raha hu isme kaun si wali aap lead keh rahe ho matlab aap keh rahe ho ki matlab jo lead aa rahi hai wo kam uski aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji kam capacity wali aa rahi hai products hamare hain but chhote hain lekin hum banate hain bade.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek second sir.

Executive: Hmm.
Executive: To maine us din shayad baat bhi hui thi aap keh rahe the ki filhal to jo hai koi dikkat nahi leads to sahi aa rahi hai hamari last time jo baat hui thi.
Customer: Ji ji sir pichle do din se hi aisa ho raha hai.
Executive: Achcha do din se hi aisa ho raha hai ye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Seller IndiaMART chal raha tha kaise chalega.
Executive: Ye wala hi apne wale pe ha tumhare wale pe client call karo nahi are seller wo dekhna na sir.
Customer: GL add wale.
Executive: Achcha GL add wale.
Customer: Admin admin.
Executive: Direct wo khul jata tha na pehle uska to uska pata tha mujhe.
Executive: Ab batao ji kaun se wale lead keh rahe the aap.
Customer: Sir dekhiye ye wood chipper ki lead aa rahi hai pehle number pe aapko dikh rahi hogi wood chipper 500 kilo per hour automatic machine.
Customer: 826000 se aa raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ek second sir net nahi chal raha pata nahi kya dikkat aa rahi hai ruko to matlab isme ek kaam karo na wo GST wali dekhi hai aapne isme.
Customer: Kaun si?
Executive: GST wali.
Customer: GST wali dekhi hai maine GST wali ye to batao dekho pehle wale mein GST verify nahi hai dusre wale mein bhi verify nahi hai teesre wale mein bhi verify nahi hai chauthe wale mein bhi verify nahi hai month month month usme jo buyer ki jo detail hoti hai.
Customer: Ji ji one month two one month two month three month aisa aa raha hai na check kariye aap khud check kariye.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: One month two month sahi keh rahe ho one month two month wali aa rahi hai isme jyadatar jo ab main dekh raha hu.
Customer: Ji ji sir pataiye sir ab isme to hamare koi benefit hi nahi hai kya fayda ho raha hai batao sir aap bhi.
Executive: Ji ji ji ab ek kaam karo main na aapko wo bhej raha hu ek kya kehte hain uska video meet ka link bhej raha hu zara video meet pe aao aur main thoda na aap se ek bari ye jo products ke regarding hai na thoda catalog ke regarding categories wagera sahi karke na aur dobara se relevant jo lead hogi main aapko batata hu aur fir jo hogi main whatsapp pe aapko bhej dunga.
Customer: Sir isme chhe month ho gaye chhe month agar ek bhi order aaya hoga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ek bhi order nahi hai sir.
Executive: Apna jo product hai na ab ek kaam karo main aapko na wo bhej raha hu zara whatsapp pe na.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Jo abhi aa rakhi hai jaise new tarike ki ye teen tarikh se juda hua hai ye wood chippers ki to ye hai apna product.
Customer: Lekin kya hai apna product but to bade products hai hamare ye chhote product hai.
Executive: Achcha chhoti machine hai ye.
Customer: Ek tan one tan ek tan do tan mein hai sir hamare ye chhote hain sir.
Executive: Agar wood chipper ki baat karu main wood chipper achcha ye badi machine hai wood chipper ki na.
Customer: Ji ye ab hamara wood chipper hai itna bada hai.
Executive: Double shaft iska na thoda wo karna padega na naam wagera sahi karke na iski categories thodi changes karni padegi aap zara main aapko na video meet pe bhej raha.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Main zara aapko link bhej raha hu whatsapp pe na zara aao join karo zara whatsapp pe na.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Wahi number ye number pe ek bari mere hi bhejna.
Executive: Aapke paas hai na mera number.
Customer: Ji number hai bhej do.
Executive: Haan wahi 11 wala number save kar rakha hai aapne mera.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads for products.

- Receiving buyleads for smaller capacity machines.

- No orders received in the last six months.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's account.

- Executive offered a video meet to correct catalog.

- Executive will send relevant buyleads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a video meet link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, products, capacity, gst
